headline.main: Where the Pounds Come Off As the Family Keeps Score

byline.original: By GEORGIA DULLEA Special to The New York Times

docs.abstract: Article on 4-wk, family-oriented program for weight control at Everglades Hotel, Miami, sponsored by Dietary Behavioral Center and supervised by drs from Miami Univ Med School; illus (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: MIAMI--Jerre Briggs suspects that the staff at the Everglades Hotel is beginning to talk. Every morning she breakfasts in the coffee shop with someone else's husband while her husband eats in the dining room with the other man's wife.
docs.snippet: MIAMI--Jerre Briggs suspects that the staff at the Everglades Hotel is beginning to talk. Every morning she breakfasts in the coffee shop with someone else's husband while her husband eats in the dining room with the other man's wife.
